samples.instruction: Tamil medium-à®²à¯ à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®šà¯à®šà®¾ future-à®²à¯ problem à®µà®°à¯à®®à®¾? English medium better-à®†?
samples.current_output: Reality check: Tamil medium = Mother tongue strong, concepts clear. English medium = Language advantage. Both work! Important: 1) Foundation subjects (Maths, Science) any medium OK 2) English can be learned later 3) Many Tamil medium toppers in competitive exams 4) Government jobs no medium preference. Advice: Choose based on child comfort. Tamil medium + English tuition = balanced approach. Focus on learning, not medium.

samples.instruction: Exam-la time management eppadi seivathu?
samples.current_output: Strategies: 1) Question paper muzhuvathum mudhalil padiyunga (5 mins) 2) Easy questions mudhalil attempt 3) Marks-ku erpa time allocate (1 mark = 1 minute rule) 4) Stuck aanaal skip, later return 5) Last 10 minutes revision-ku keep 6) Answer length = marks (2 marks = half page, 5 marks = 1 page) 7) Watch/clock parunga regularly. Practice: At home, exam conditions-la previous papers ezhuthunga.

samples.instruction: TNPSC free coaching à®à®™à¯à®•à¯‡ à®•à®¿à®Ÿà¯ˆà®•à¯à®•à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Free coaching centres: 1) Government Free Coaching - Chennai, Trichy, Madurai, Coimbatore (Apply through Employment Exchange) 2) BC/MBC Welfare Department coaching 3) Adi Dravidar Welfare (SC/ST) 4) District Collectorate coaching programs 5) IAS Academy free batches. Online free: TNPSC Shouters, Group Exam Tamil YouTube channels, Telegram groups. Selection: Merit + income based. Apply early - limited seats.

samples.instruction: Offer letter à®µà®¨à¯à®¤à®¾à®šà¯à®šà¯, joining-à®•à¯à®•à¯ à®®à¯à®©à¯à®©à®¾à®Ÿà®¿ à®à®©à¯à®© check à®ªà®£à¯à®£à®£à¯à®®à¯?
samples.current_output: Verify before joining: 1) Company registration - MCA website check 2) Glassdoor reviews - employee experiences 3) Offer letter details - CTC breakdown, deductions 4) Bond clause - duration, penalty 5) Notice period - reasonable? 6) Probation period - terms 7) Location confirmation 8) Joining date flexibility. Documents to prepare: Original certificates, bank account, PAN card, Aadhaar, photos. Background verification: Common in MNCs - ensure documents genuine.

samples.instruction: à®•à¯‹à®µà¯ˆà®¯à®¿à®²à¯ engineering à®ªà®Ÿà®¿à®•à¯à®• à®¨à®²à¯à®² college à®à®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: PSG Tech (autonomous - best ranking), GCT (government), CIT, Amrita, KGISL à®†à®•à®¿à®¯à®µà¯ˆ à®®à¯à®©à¯à®©à®£à®¿ colleges. PSG-à®•à¯à®•à¯ TNEA counselling-à®²à¯ high cutoff à®µà®°à¯à®®à¯. GCT government college - fees à®®à®¿à®•à®•à¯ à®•à¯à®±à¯ˆà®µà¯.

samples.instruction: 12th mudinjachu, veetla college vendaam, kalyanam pannikonu solraanga. Naan padikkanum.
samples.current_output: Your education is your RIGHT! Support available: 1) Moovalur Ramamirtham - financial support for girl education 2) Free government college education 3) Women helpline: 181 4) District Women Protection Officer 5) NGOs: Pratham, CRY support. Convince family: Show scholarship opportunities, free education costs, earning potential after degree. Legal: Child Marriage Prevention Act (below 18 illegal). Study brings independence and better life. Don't give up your dreams!

samples.instruction: ITI-la ennenna trades padikkalaam? Edhu popular?
samples.current_output: Popular ITI trades: 1) Electrician - mikavum demand 2) Fitter - manufacturing jobs 3) Welder - construction, shipyard 4) Motor Mechanic - automobile industry 5) COPA (Computer Operator) - IT support 6) Electronics Mechanic 7) Plumber - house construction 8) Turner - machine shop. Duration: 1-2 years. TN-la 130+ trades available. Government ITI free-yaa padikkalaam.

samples.instruction: Disabled child-ku enna benefits irukku school-la?

samples.instruction: KVPY scholarship à®à®©à¯à®©? Science students à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ apply à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY): IISc Bangalore à®¨à®Ÿà®¤à¯à®¤à¯à®®à¯ science aptitude test. Streams: SA (Class 11), SX (Class 12), SB (1st year BSc). Scholarship: â‚¹5,000-7,000/à®®à®¾à®¤à®®à¯ + annual contingency grant. Selection: Aptitude test + Interview. Benefits: IISc/IISERs admission priority. 2022 onwards INSPIRE SHE-à®†à®• merge à®†à®©à®¤à¯, but similar benefits continue through INSPIRE.

samples.instruction: Management quota vs Government quota - enna difference?
samples.current_output: Government quota (65%): Counselling-based merit admission, low fees. Management quota (35%): College direct admission, higher fees (2-5x). NRI quota: Foreign citizen children, highest fees. Reality: Same degree, same placement opportunity. Management quota useful if: Marks low but can afford, specific college wanted, late application. Government quota: Always try first - significant cost savings. Private self-financing colleges: 100% management, higher fees.

samples.instruction: Resume/CV à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ à®à®´à¯à®¤à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Resume essentials: 1) Contact info - email (professional), phone 2) Education - reverse chronological, CGPA 3) Skills - technical + soft skills 4) Projects - 2-3 relevant ones with outcomes 5) Internships/Experience 6) Achievements - quantify where possible 7) Extra-curricular - leadership roles. Format: 1 page for freshers, clean design, no photos (India OK), PDF format. Avoid: Spelling errors, lying, lengthy paragraphs. Templates: Canva, Novoresume free options.

samples.instruction: Scholarship status à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ check à®šà¯†à®¯à¯à®µà®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Status check à®µà®´à®¿à®•à®³à¯: 1) NSP portal login - application status tab 2) PFMS portal (Public Financial Management System) - payment tracking 3) State scholarship portal - individual login 4) SMS alerts (registered mobile) 5) College scholarship cell. Payment delay: 2-3 months normal. Rejected à®†à®©à®¾à®²à¯: Defect list à®ªà®¾à®°à¯à®¤à¯à®¤à¯ correct documents upload. Grievance: helpdesk on portal.

samples.instruction: Digital Marketing course padikkanum, free options irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Free courses: 1) Google Digital Garage - Google certification 2) HubSpot Academy - Inbound marketing 3) Meta Blueprint - Facebook/Instagram ads 4) Semrush Academy - SEO 5) NPTEL digital marketing. Paid: TNSDC subsidized courses. Topics: SEO, SEM, Social media, Content marketing, Email marketing. Jobs: Digital marketing executive â‚¹15,000-25,000. Freelancing possible. Build own social media presence as portfolio.

samples.instruction: En paiyanukku 6 vayasu aachu, Government school-la eppadi serpathu?
samples.current_output: Class 1 admission: Age 5+ (as on June 1st). Process: 1) Nearest government primary school-la neradigava sellunga 2) Application form vaangunga 3) Documents: Birth certificate, Aadhaar, parent ID, address proof, photos 4) Admission free - no donation 5) TC not needed for new admission. RTE Act: 25% seats private schools-layum EWS/DG category-ku reserved. Online: www.tnschools.gov.in for RTE admission.

samples.instruction: TNSDC free courses enna?
samples.current_output: TNSDC offers 100+ free courses: 1) IT/Software - Web development, Data entry 2) Manufacturing - CNC, Welding 3) Healthcare - Nursing assistant, Lab technician 4) Retail - Sales, customer service 5) Hospitality - Hotel management basics 6) Construction - Mason, plumber. Duration: 1-6 months. Certification + placement assistance. Apply: www.tnskill.tn.gov.in. Age: 18-35. Free hostel for outstation candidates.

samples.instruction: CS (Company Secretary) padippu enna? Eppadi seruvathu?
samples.current_output: ICSI nadathum padippu. Levels: 1) Foundation (+2 aprom) 2) Executive 3) Professional. Total duration: 3-4 years. Practical training 15 months. Fee: Foundation â‚¹4,500, Executive â‚¹16,000, Professional â‚¹20,000. Corporate law, governance specialization. Good salary in companies.

samples.instruction: Bank exam Reasoning section à®à®ªà¯à®ªà®Ÿà®¿ crack à®ªà®£à¯à®±à®¤à¯?
samples.current_output: Reasoning topics: Puzzles & Seating Arrangement (30-40% weightage), Syllogism, Blood Relations, Direction, Coding-Decoding, Inequality. Strategy: 1) Puzzles - daily 10 practice 2) Logic rules memorize 3) Speed improve through timed practice 4) Easy questions first in exam 5) Skip time-consuming Qs. Resources: RS Aggarwal, Rakesh Yadav, Testbook app. Time: 35 questions in 20-25 minutes. Practice = key to success.

samples.instruction: IBPS PO/Clerk Exam Pattern enna? Eppadi prepare seyvadhu?
samples.current_output:
**IBPS PO/Clerk Pattern:**

**PO:**
- Prelims: English 30 + Quant 35 + Reasoning 35 = 100 (1 hour)
- Mains: 200 marks (3 hours) + Interview 100

**Clerk:**
- Prelims: Same 100 marks
- Mains: 200 marks (2 hrs 40 min)
- No Interview!

**Books:**
- Quant: RS Aggarwal
- Reasoning: RS Aggarwal, MK Pandey
- English: Wren & Martin
- Banking: Arihant

**6-Month Plan:**
- Month 1-2: Basics + Current affairs
- Month 3-4: Advanced + Speed
- Month 5-6: Mock tests daily

**Daily:** Quant 2hr + Reasoning 2hr + English 1hr + GK 1hr + Mock 1hr

samples.current_output: Growing industry! Courses: 1) B.Sc Animation 2) Diploma (Arena, MAAC, Frameboxx) 3) Certificate courses. Duration: 6 months - 3 years. Skills: Maya, 3ds Max, After Effects, Photoshop. Jobs: Animation studios, Game companies, Ad agencies, Film industry (VFX). Chennai: Major hub for animation studios. Salary: â‚¹15,000-40,000 starting. Freelancing possible. Portfolio = key to jobs.

samples.instruction: Polytechnic Diploma à®à®©à¯à®©? ITI-à®¯à®¿à®²à®¿à®°à¯à®¨à¯à®¤à¯ à®à®©à¯à®© à®µà®¿à®¤à¯à®¤à®¿à®¯à®¾à®šà®®à¯?
samples.current_output: à®µà®¿à®¤à¯à®¤à®¿à®¯à®¾à®šà®®à¯: ITI = Trade training (practical focused), Diploma = Technical education (theory + practical). Diploma: 3 years after 10th. samples.instruction: IBPS Clerk vs IBPS PO - edhu apply panrathu better?
samples.current_output: Comparison: Clerk - 12th pass eligible, â‚¹20,000-45,000 salary, clerical work. PO - Degree required, â‚¹40,000-80,000+ salary, managerial track. Difficulty: PO > Clerk. Career growth: PO faster promotions. Recommendation: Apply both! Same preparation works. Clerk = safe backup while aiming PO. Age: Clerk 20-28, PO 20-30. Competition: Both high, PO slightly more. Interview: PO has, Clerk doesn't (most banks).
